dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: Not too long after Natsuki took her leave, another familiar face entered the music room. A certain ‘lovely lavender lady’, to be exact.

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Yuri! No worries, I’ve just been pacing around, passing time until our next club meeting."

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "Mhhm. This may be a little odd for me to say out of nowhere, but…"

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "With all we’ve been doing in the club, that discomfort I feel… trying to commit to presenting what I do in front of others."

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "It’s gradually subsiding the more we do things together as a club."

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "The writing, singing, and just… talking. It's all given me a much better alternative to… releasing my emotions."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "I’m so happy to hear that, Yuri! I’ve noticed you stepping out of your comfort zone a lot more as of late, and your confident singing voice is always pleasant to hear."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Knowing that this club has been such a good place of self-improvement for you, I couldn't be happier to hear that."

dialogue.name: no_one
dialogue.string: Yuri breaks eye contact and looks away for just a second; A shy smile cropping up on her face.

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "I wanted to celebrate this personal milestone with something special."

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "I… wrote my own song. This is new territory for my writing prowess, so I wanted to ask if you’d like to perform it with me here."

dialogue.name: yuri
dialogue.string: "Just a little bit of peer review before I show the others."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "Shall we begin? My vocal chords are already warmed up!"
